source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a blurry, out-of-focus shot of a moss-covered stone structure in the foreground. In the background, a line of green trees stands against a bright, white sky. The camera exhibits some minor movement throughout the clip.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a blurry, out-of-focus shot of a moss-covered stone structure in the foreground. In the background, a line of green trees stands against a bright, white sky. The camera exhibits some minor movement throughout the clip.

generated_critique: The caption accurately identifies the lack of subject motion and the presence of minor camera movement. However, it includes a detailed description of the static scenery ("a blurry, out-of-focus shot of a moss-covered stone structure in the foreground. In the background, a line of green trees stands against a bright, white sky."). According to the instructions, for a scenery shot without salient subjects, the caption should briefly note the lack of motion in one to three sentences rather than describing the scene in detail. The first two sentences should be removed or condensed to focus solely on the motion aspect, as the description of the static elements is redundant.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a static shot with minor camera movement.
